title: Introducing: Junior A
body:
Definitely something vibey going on with Lithuania’s Junior A – landing somewhere between Glass Animals and How To Dress Well, with a hint of The XX thrown in.

Glitchy pop productions with an underlying funk to them – Sleep Machine and Guess You Are Real are lifted from his new mixtape titled bornbusy.

Glitchy pop productions with an underlying funk to them – Sleep Machine and Guess You Are Real are lifted from his new mixtape titled bornbusy.
